Dhol Frequency Powering The Dhol Industry & In Importing Dhols into the Uk

5 year guarantee on all Dhols

If you have any problems with the wood of the dhol we offer a 5 year guarentee where we will replace like for like, up until today we had not one returned to us. We also make custom designs so feel free to submit your ideas to us of how you would like your own unique personal Dhol.

Shipping

From India to England we have a 7 day Promise from when your order is completed, whilst we show you step by step as your order is being completed.

learning

We offer great deals for the learners to start learning and great prices on Dhol's for new starters. We teach from the age of 5, all teachers are correctly credited and CRB checked and are abiding the correct procedures whilst teaching this form of art to a student.
